item.title: Getting started with Hugo
item.description: My aim was to play with Virtual Private Server (VPS) and get my own domain. This has begun when I have visited a friend of mine, who has build and maintain his on website using VPS server from Forpsi.com. Then the website itself is created using framework for building website called HUGO. So I took a note and in a couple of days I have spent an evening for domain creation and VPS creation on Forpsi.
